addVirtualMacNew: Create a new virtual MAC address
addVirtualMacNewInfo: Virtual MAC addresses allow for better management of IP addresses by assigning unique MAC addresses to each virtual machine.
addVirtualMacNewInfoGuide: See the guide on virtual MACs
addVirtualMacExisting: Use an existing virtual MAC address
viewVirtualMacQuestion: Here is the information on the virtual MAC address:
addVirtualMacAddNewSuccess: A new virtual MAC address will be generated, and will be available on the {{t0}} IP shortly.
addVirtualMacAddNewFailure: An error has occurred generating a new virtual MAC address on the {{t0}} IP. {{error}} request_id: {{ovhQueryId}} IP
addVirtualMacAddExistingSuccess: The {{t0}} IP will be associated with the existing virtual MAC address shortly.
addVirtualMacAddExistingFailure: An error has occurred linking an existing virtual MAC address with the {{t0}} IP. {{error}} request_id: {{ovhQueryId}}
deleteVirtualMacInfo: Deleting this virtual MAC address will unassign the IP address linked to the VM, which could disrupt the services or configurations that use it. This action cannot be reversed.
deleteVirtualMacConfirmation: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the virtual MAC address?
deleteVirtualMacSuccess: The {{vmac}} virtual MAC address will be deleted from the {{ip}} IP in a few moments.
deleteVirtualMacError: An error has occurred deleting the virtual MAC address: {{error}}
